title: A discussion of climate change and brain implants
itunes:title: A discussion of climate change and brain implants
description:
George Noory and Bart Kosko talk about his new book Cool Earth. They touch on global warming, cooling experiments and brain implants.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
